Test Case Description: Valid login with correct username and password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Enter valid username: 'standard_user'
3. Enter valid password: 'secret_sauce'
4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should be logged in and redirected to the products page

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Enter invalid username: 'incorrect_user'
3. Enter valid password: 'secret_sauce'
4. Click on login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed indicating invalid username

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Enter valid username: 'standard_user'
3. Enter invalid password: 'wrong_password'
4. Click on login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed indicating incorrect password

Test Case Description: Login with empty username or password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Leave username field empty
3. Enter valid password: 'secret_sauce'
4. Click on login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed indicating that username is required

Test Case Description: Login with empty username or password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Enter valid username: 'standard_user'
3. Leave password field empty
4. Click on login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed indicating that password is required
